package.name: recognition_and_delineation_of_writings
package.description: This is the package.xml of a package which was built especially for the whole process from putting a painted sheet of paper under a camera to portray the same pattern on a clear sheet of paper with the help of a robot. The package has a node called 'starting_node' that takes images from a topic and pushes them on an other topic every time a user invokes the offered service with the name 'redirect_image'. Furthermore, the package provides a launch file that runs a lot of nodes from the packages 'paper_detection', 'coordinate_exposure', 'point_approximation and 'writings_determination' and connects them via changing the names of the published and subscribed topics.
package.author: Philip Tietjen
